metadata.description: Enter the worldwide unique name for Data Factory
Enter the unique Name of the Azure storage account that contains the input/output data.
By Default eastus location is allowed
Enter Email to send the notification.
Enter Teams Connection Name e.g teams-1
Enter the unique SQL server Name

properties.description: This is an suppressed rule to deactivate the email.

activities.name: MetaDataCurrentCSVFile
activities.description: This metadata activity will gets the csv file data of new incoming csv file data.

activities.name: MoreColumnnsInCurrentSchema
activities.description: We will compare the incoming values from 2 metadata activities (CurrentCSV, LastSavedCSV)

ifFalseActivities.name: Wait-FalseMoreColumns
ifFalseActivities.description: This is false activty in More Columns condition.

ifTrueActivities.name: Alert_Schema_Has_More_Columns
ifTrueActivities.description: This is a wait activity and we shall set alerts on it.

activities.name: LessColumnnsInCurrentSchema
activities.description: We will compare the incoming values from 2 metadata activities (CurrentCSV, LastSavedCSV)

ifFalseActivities.name: Wait-FalseSchemaHasLessColumns
ifFalseActivities.description: This is false Activity in Schema has less columns activity.

ifTrueActivities.name: Alert_Schema_Has_Less_Columns
ifTrueActivities.description: This is wait activity ans we shall setup alert on it.

activities.name: SameColumnsButDifferentArangements
activities.description: We will compare the incoming values from 2 metadata activities (CurrentCSV, LastSavedCSV) to check the same columns but different schema.

ifFalseActivities.name: Wait-FalseSameColumns
ifFalseActivities.description: False Activity for Same Columns but different Schema.

ifTrueActivities.name: Alert_Schema_Has_Same_Column_But_Different_Structure
ifTrueActivities.description: This is alert activity when columns are same but different structure.

activities.name: GetLastSchema
activities.description: This will get the lastly saved schema.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'ch_schema')
BEGIN
EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA ch_schema')
select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END
ELSE
BEGIN
    select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END

preCopyScript.value:
If OBJECT_ID('[ch_schema].[current_table]', 'U') is NOT NULL

BEGIN

DROP TABLE [ch_schema].[current_table];

END

If OBJECT_ID('[ch_schema].[last_table]', 'U') is NOT NULL

BEGIN

DROP TABLE [ch_schema].[last_table];

END

sqlReaderQuery.value:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'ch_schema')
BEGIN
EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA ch_schema')
END
IF NOT EXISTS (
    select * 
    from sys.objects 
    WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[ch_schema].[ProcDTypeChange]')
    )
BEGIN
    EXEC('CREATE PROCEDURE ch_schema.ProcDTypeChange AS IF OBJECT_ID(''ch_schema.store_procedure_result'', ''u'') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ch_schema.store_procedure_result; CREATE TABLE ch_schema.store_procedure_result( table1_name varchar(255), Column1_name varchar(255), DATA_TYPE1 varchar(255), table2_name varchar(255), Column2_name varchar(255), DATA_TYPE2 varchar(255) ); INSERT INTO ch_schema.store_procedure_result SELECT c1.table_name, c1.COLUMN_NAME, c1.DATA_TYPE, c2.table_name, c2.COLUMN_NAME, c2.DATA_TYPE FROM [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[COLUMNS] c1 INNER JOIN [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[COLUMNS] c2 ON (c1.COLUMN_NAME = c2.COLUMN_NAME AND c1.data_type <> c2.DATA_TYPE) WHERE c1.table_name=''current_table'' AND c2.table_name = ''last_table'';')
    select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END
ELSE
BEGIN
    select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END

properties.description: This is linked service which linked the input to the Data Factory.
This is a linked service which is used to sink the data in SQL database.

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	filename as string ('covid_tracking'),
	runid as string ('runtime_guid')
}
source(output(
		date as date,
		county as string,
		state as string,
		fips as integer,
		cases as short,
		deaths as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceCSV
HeadingInitialsCapitalized derive(Load_Date = currentDate('UTC'),
		Load_Time = currentUTC('yyyy-MM-dd'),
		ISO_Country = 'US',
		Death_Rate = toInteger(divide(Deaths, Cases)*100)) ~> Add4columns
Add4columns select(mapColumn(
		Load_Date,
		Load_Time,
		Record_Date = Date,
		County,
		State,
		Fips,
		Cases,
		Deaths,
		ISO_Country,
		Death_Rate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReformatHeadingAndColumns
sourceCSV select(mapColumn(
		each(patternMatch(`.*`),
			initCap($$) = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HeadingInitialsCapitalized
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkParquet
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestParquet
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.jsonl'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkJsonl
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkCSV
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.jsonl'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestJsonl
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkLatestCSV

parameters{
	filename as string ('covid_tracking'),
	runid as string ('runtime_guid')
}
source(output(
		date as date,
		county as string,
		state as string,
		fips as integer,
		cases as short,
		deaths as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceCSV
HeadingInitialsCapitalized derive(Load_Date = currentDate('UTC'),
		Load_Time = currentUTC('yyyy-MM-dd'),
		ISO_Country = 'US',
		Death_Rate = toInteger(divide(Deaths, Cases)*100)) ~> Add4columns
Add4columns select(mapColumn(
		Load_Date,
		Load_Time,
		Record_Date = Date,
		County,
		State,
		Fips,
		Cases,
		Deaths,
		ISO_Country,
		Death_Rate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReformatHeadingAndColumns
sourceCSV select(mapColumn(
		each(patternMatch(`.*`),
			initCap($$) = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HeadingInitialsCapitalized
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkParquet
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestParquet
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.jsonl'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkJsonl
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename,'_', $runid,'.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkCSV
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.jsonl'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkLatestJsonl
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($filename, '.csv'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkLatestCSV
ReformatHeadingAndColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkSql

body.content:
Hello this is Pipeline Failure Alert Please check this:

  
Alert name: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['name']}    
Description: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['description']}       
ResourceGroup Name: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['resourceGroupName']}     
Resource Name: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['resourceName']}    
Resource Type: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['resourceType']}    
Failed Pipeline Name: @{triggerBody().data.context.condition.allOf[0].dimensions[1]['value']}
Failure Type: @{triggerBody().data.context.condition.allOf[0].dimensions[2]['value']}

Hello this is Pipeline Cancellation Alert:

 
Alert name: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['name']}    
Description: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['description']}   
ResourceGroup Name: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['resourceGroupName']}     
Resource Name: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['resourceName']}    
Resource Type: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['resourceType']}    
Cancelled Pipeline Name: @{triggerBody().data.context.condition.allOf[0].dimensions[1]['value']}

Hello this is Activity Failure Alert:

Description: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['description']}    
ResourceGroup Name: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['resourceGroupName']}     
Resource Name: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['resourceName']}

Failed Activity Name: @{triggerBody().data.context.condition.allOf[0].dimensions[2]['value']}
Failure Type: @{triggerBody().data.context.condition.allOf[0].dimensions[4]['value']}

Hello this is Activity Cancellation Alert:

This is an Alert Message your pipeline is Success:

Resource Type: @{triggerBody()['data']['context']['resourceType']}    
Failed Pipeline Name: @{triggerBody().data.context.condition.allOf[0].dimensions[1]['value']}

It has more columns.

This is Default condition in switch. No relevent Alert is found in switch.

properties.description: This is an alert message when the SQL Table columns data type is changed.
This is an alert to notify the Schema Has Less Columns.
This is an alert to notify the Schema Has More Columns.
This is an alert to notify the Schema Has Same Columns But Different Structure.
This is an alert that the trigger is Failed.
This is an alert that the trigger is cancelled.
